thread.title: Turkish military operation aims to liberate Afrin: senior official

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Turkish military operation aims to liberate Afrin: senior official
text:
ISTANBUL (Reuters) - A Turkish military operation over Syriaâ€™s Afrin region aims to liberate it from the control of Kurdish militants from the YPG and PYD groups, a senior Turkish official told Reuters.
Freeing nearby Manbij from militant control will follow the operation to Afrin, the source said, adding that the operations are aimed at re-building social and economic infrastructure in the region.
Reporting by Orhan Coskun; Writing by Ezgi Erkoyun; editing by John Stonestreet
